amendment.description: To require a report on the stabilization of Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3472 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 71 - 27. Record Vote Number: 137.

action.text: Amendment SA 3472 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S7207-7210, S7224; text: S7207) To require a report on the stabilization of Iraq.
